Package a1

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IUpdatePositionStrategy
    Strategy interface that provides the signature for updating the model's position
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionOnModel  
    ActionStrategy
    This class defines an AbstractAction that acts upon a Model
    ActionToggleColor
    An action that toggles the model's color This class implements the following requirement from the Assignment 1 description: A key binding that toggles the triangle between a single solid color and a gradient of three colors when user presses the ‘c’ key.
    CircularMovement
    This class is simultaneously an action and a strategy.
    ModelProxy
    This class provides for read only access to a model for a view.
    ModifySizeListener
    This class listens for mouse wheel input and implements the following requirement from the Assignment 1 description: mouse wheel control increases and decreases the size of the triangle
    NoMovement  
    Starter
    The main entry point into Assignment 1.
    TriangleController
    This class is the controller portion of the Model-View-Controller architecture It acts upon a model (or creates objects that act upon it)
    TriangleModel
    The Model portion of the MVC architecture This contains all of the information being acted on
    TriangleView
    The view of the model Draws the triangle on the screen
    Util
    Provides Utility/Helper functions for various aspects of the program
    Util.JOGL  
    Util.OGL  
    VerticalMovement
    This class is simultaneously an action and a strategy.
